SEARCH
Package br.com.concepting.framework.security.controller

Class SecurityFilter

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.security.controller.SecurityFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
@WebFilter(filterName="securityFilter", urlPatterns={"*.ui","*.jsp","/webServices/*"}) public class SecurityFilter extends Object implements javax.servlet.Filter
Class responsible to apply security filters in the system requests.
Since:

      Returns:

    • process

      protected void process() throws UserNotAuthorizedException, PermissionDeniedException, InternalErrorException
      Process the security filter.
      Throws:
      UserNotAuthorizedException - Occurs when the user is not authorized.
      PermissionDeniedException - Occurs when the user doesn't have permission.
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to process the filter.

    • initialize
